human.name: Human
human.description: The adaptable majority of the world, capable of great achievements through determination and willpower.

abilities.name: Adaptability
abilities.description: Humans learn 10% faster than other races

traits: Can join any faction without penalties
human.lore: Humans are the most numerous race in the One Piece world. While they may not have the natural physical advantages of other races, their adaptability and determination have allowed them to achieve great things. From the Pirate King Gol D. Roger to the World's Strongest Man Whitebeard, humans have proven time and again that with enough will, anyone can reach the top.

fishman.name: Fish-Man / Mermaid
fishman.description: Aquatic beings with incredible strength and the ability to breathe underwater.

abilities.name: Fish-Man Karate
abilities.description: Special martial arts that manipulate water

fishman.lore: Fish-Men and Mermaids are the proud inhabitants of Fish-Man Island. Despite facing discrimination from some humans, they possess incredible physical strength and unique abilities. Fish-Man Karate allows them to manipulate water itself as a weapon, making them formidable opponents both in and out of water. Many Fish-Men struggle with the choice between hatred and coexistence with humanity.

mink.name: Mink
mink.description: Anthropomorphic animal warriors with the natural ability to generate electricity.

abilities.name: Electro
abilities.description: Basic lightning attack with stun chance

abilities.name: Sulong Form
abilities.description: Massive power boost during full moon events

mink.lore: The Mink Tribe are a race of humanoid animals living on the moving island of Zou. They are a warrior race, naturally born fighters who can generate electricity called 'Electro.' During full moons, they can transform into their Sulong form, gaining incredible power at the cost of losing control. Minks value loyalty above all else and will fight to the death for their friends.

skypiean.name: Skypiean
skypiean.description: Inhabitants of the sky islands with angel-like wings and mastery of dial technology.

abilities.name: Sky-Dweller
abilities.description: Reduced fall damage and aerial movement

abilities.name: Dial Mastery
abilities.description: Can use and craft various dial types

abilities.name: Cloud Walking
abilities.description: Can walk on clouds and navigate sky islands

skypiean.lore: Skypieans are the inhabitants of various sky islands located 10,000 meters above the sea. They have small wings on their backs and are generally peaceful people who have developed unique dial technology. Their culture revolves around the worship of 'Vearth' (earth/soil) as it's extremely rare in the sky. They have a complex history with the Shandians and often struggle with conflicts over sacred land.

giant.name: Giant
giant.description: Massive humanoid beings with incredible physical strength and proud warrior traditions.

abilities.name: Giant's Strength
abilities.description: Can wield oversized weapons and has incredible power

abilities.name: Intimidating Presence
abilities.description: Smaller enemies may flee in fear

abilities.name: Knockback Resistance
abilities.description: Extremely difficult to move or knock down

disadvantages: Difficult to find appropriately sized equipment
giant.lore: Giants are a proud warrior race from Elbaf, the strongest country in the world. They live by a code of honor and settle disputes through combat. Giants can live for over 300 years and are respected throughout the world for their strength and noble nature. Many giants serve in the Marines as powerful combatants, while others become legendary pirates.

cyborg.name: Cyborg
cyborg.description: Mechanically enhanced beings with artificial body parts and technological capabilities.

abilities.name: Mechanical Upgrades
abilities.description: Can install custom modules and enhancements

abilities.name: Self-Repair
abilities.description: Repairs damage over time instead of natural healing

abilities.name: Energy Weapons
abilities.description: Can fire laser beams and energy attacks

traits: Immune to most poisons and diseases
cyborg.lore: Cyborgs are rare individuals who have replaced parts of their bodies with mechanical components. This transformation is usually done out of necessity after severe injury, or by choice to gain power. Cyborgs must maintain their mechanical parts and can be upgraded with new technology. The most famous cyborg is Franky of the Straw Hat Pirates, who rebuilt himself with scrap metal and cola-powered systems.
